description: This file defines React components for Card UI elements, including Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardDescription, CardContent, and CardFooter, using React.forwardRef for ref forwarding and utility class name management.

methods.name: Card
methods.description: A React functional component representing a styled card container, with ref forwarding.

methods.name: CardHeader
methods.description: A React component for the header section of the card, styled with flex and spacing.

methods.name: CardTitle
methods.description: A React component for the card's title text, styled with font weight and tracking.

methods.name: CardDescription
methods.description: A React component for descriptive text within the card, styled with muted color.

methods.name: CardContent
methods.description: A React component for the main content area of the card, with padding.

methods.name: CardFooter
methods.description: A React component for the footer section of the card, aligned with flex and padding.
